mutation_rules.truth_drift: On a low deterministic roll (1-5 on mapped d20), reduce truth by one step; on 16-20, increase clarity by one step.
mutation_rules.tone_hooks: Rumors adopt the current tone dial adjectives when retold, affecting NPC reactions.

spread_rules.pace: At the end of every scene, choose one source that heard the rumor; during downtime, two sources spread.
filters: Factions with reputation +3 or higher boost spread for allied rumors
Clocks that are half full or more accelerate related rumor spread
Travel scenes spread rumors between hexes even without contact
